p: Codes were set to the data and inputted employing the Graph Pad prism version 7 software. Differences between groups were verified by means of the Chi-Square test (qualitative variables), independent sample T-test, and analysis of variance (ANOVA). Post hoc Bonferroni test was used for normally distributed quantitative variables. The difference was considered a statistically significant when P-values were equal to or less than .05.
